name: R.O.O.S
description:
Team Name

NoTeam

Modifier Category

Army of One

KitBasher

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

Description

R.O.O.S is a multiuser first person survival game. 

The goal is it to survive as may waves of enemies as possible.

If all silos are destroyed or all player are dead, the game is over.

At higher wave numbers, you will run out of space in order to evade enemies.

Have fun and good luck!

Number Player

1-4 (local network)

Gameplay Instructions

Keyboard

W,A,S,D: Move character

Mouse Movement: Lookaround 

Left Shift: Sprint

Left Ctrl: Crouch

Spacebar: Jump

Left Mouse Button: Attack

Escape: Menu, Quit

Controller (Menus are not working with controller)

Left Thumb Stick: Move character

Right: Lookaround 

Left Shoulder Button: Sprint

Left Trigger Button: Crouch

Facebutton bottom: Jump

Right Trigger Button: Attack

Special Right Button: Menu, Quit

Enemies have a chance of dropping health or cooling packs.

Health pack: Provides a small amount of health

Cooling pack: Reduces your weapon temperature a small amount

List any content that was created before the jam:

UE4 First Person Template

EPIC Shooter Game (Learning content)

Particle and Sounds

ActionRPG (Learning content)

Enemy assets (Spider)

https://github.com/mordentral/AdvancedSessionsPlugin
